message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth a little more.  How about we settle on $13,000?
I understand the value of the product, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11,500. Can you consider that?
